posts.content:
Hi everyone, I am Alex, a solo developer with a full time job. I have been on the hunt for the perfect todo app to help me to manage my job and my life. Now I know that there is simply no such thing but I am having a go at making something that will work for me and I hope it works for more people as well.

This project fulfils a few goals for me. I get to make an actual app on the app store(s), I get my own custom todo app that should work for me the way I want it to. I get to learn about technologies that are quite far outside of my usual day job. I get to have fun in my own nerdy way. This whole project is pretty cool for me :-)
